basmati-rice.name: Premium Basmati Rice
basmati-rice.description: World's finest aromatic long-grain rice. Premium Sella (8.35mm), Golden Sella (8.30mm), and Steam (8.35mm) variants. <2% broken premium grade. Sourced directly from Punjab and Haryana mills with complete quality certification.

varieties.name: 1121 Basmati Creamy Sella
varieties.details: Premium quality 1121 Basmati rice with creamy sella processing. Known for its extra-long grains (8.35mm) and aromatic fragrance. Contains aromatic compound 2-acetyl-1-pyrroline giving distinctive pandan-like aroma.

varieties.name: 1121 Basmati Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled 1121 Basmati rice. Retains more nutrients through parboiling process. Excellent cooking properties with non-sticky grains. Best for commercial and bulk orders.

varieties.name: 1121 Basmati Steam
varieties.details: Steamed 1121 Basmati rice with superior grain length. Excellent grain elongation after cooking. Ideal for biryani, pulao and premium dishes.

varieties.name: 1509 Basmati Golden Sella
varieties.details: Premium 1509 variety with golden sella processing. Extra-long grains with excellent aroma. High elongation ratio and non-sticky texture.

varieties.name: 1509 Basmati Creamy Sella
varieties.details: 1509 Basmati with creamy sella processing. Superior quality with exceptional grain length. Premium aroma and taste profile.

varieties.name: Pusa Basmati 1121
varieties.details: Traditional Pusa Basmati variety developed by IARI. Authentic aroma and taste. Good grain elongation and non-sticky after cooking.

varieties.name: Pusa Basmati Creamy Sella
varieties.details: Creamy sella Pusa Basmati with perfect texture. Longer shelf life through sella processing. Excellent for daily consumption and export.

varieties.name: Pusa Basmati Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled Pusa Basmati. Nutrient-rich with improved cooking quality. Better grain separation and firmness.

varieties.name: Sharbati Basmati Steam
varieties.details: Sharbati variety with exceptional grain length. Steamed processing for premium quality. Perfect for special occasions and luxury dining.

varieties.name: Sharbati Basmati Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled Sharbati rice. Rich golden color with enhanced nutritional value. Excellent cooking quality.

packingTypes.description: PP bags with inner lining for wholesale
Jute or PP bags for bulk export
Retail packs with custom branding available

finishedProducts.storage: Cool, dry place away from moisture and direct sunlight

non-basmati-rice.name: Non-Basmati Rice
non-basmati-rice.description: High-quality non-aromatic rice varieties for daily consumption and commercial use. Includes IR64, Sona Masoori, Swarna, and Parboiled rice. Sourced from Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, and other premium growing regions.

varieties.name: IR 64 Parboiled
varieties.details: Most popular non-basmati variety for export. Parboiled for better nutrition retention. Firm texture, non-sticky grains. Ideal for commercial kitchens and bulk consumption.

varieties.name: IR 64 Raw (White)
varieties.details: Raw white IR64 rice. Cost-effective option for daily meals. Good cooking properties with moderate elongation. Perfect for large-scale catering.

varieties.name: Sona Masoori Steam
varieties.details: Premium medium-grain rice from Andhra Pradesh. Lightweight and aromatic. Low starch content makes it ideal for healthy diets. Popular in South Indian cuisine.

varieties.name: Swarna Rice
varieties.details: High-yielding variety developed by IRRI. Good cooking quality with soft texture. Widely consumed in India. Excellent for daily consumption.

varieties.name: Parmal (PR) 11
varieties.details: Short grain variety from Punjab. Good milling recovery. Suitable for making idli, dosa batter. Popular in North India.

varieties.name: Parboiled Rice
varieties.details: General parboiled rice variety. Partially precooked in husk. Better nutrient retention. Firmer texture, ideal for fried rice and commercial use.

varieties.name: 100% Broken Rice
varieties.details: Economical broken rice for animal feed, brewing, or processing industries. Competitive pricing for bulk orders.

varieties.name: Ponni Rice (Raw)
varieties.details: Popular South Indian variety. Soft and fluffy texture after cooking. Rich in nutrients. Ideal for daily meals and traditional dishes.

rice.name: Premium Rice
rice.description: Ours is a name reckoned among the leading manufacturers of matchless quality rice grains. We're a professional in escalating high volumes of producing nutritious & non-polished rice across the globe.

varieties.name: 1121 Creamy Sella
varieties.details: Premium quality 1121 Basmati rice with creamy sella processing. Known for its extra-long grains and aromatic fragrance.

varieties.name: 1121 Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled 1121 Basmati rice, retains more nutrients and has excellent cooking properties with non-sticky grains.

varieties.name: 1121 Steam
varieties.details: Steamed 1121 Basmati rice with superior grain length and excellent cooking characteristics. Ideal for biryani and pulao.

varieties.name: Pusa / DB STEAM
varieties.details: Traditional Pusa Basmati variety processed with steam, offering authentic aroma and taste.

varieties.name: Pusa / DB Creamy Sella
varieties.details: Creamy sella Pusa Basmati with perfect texture and longer shelf life. Excellent for daily consumption.

varieties.name: Pusa /DB Raw
varieties.details: Raw Pusa Basmati rice, unprocessed and natural, perfect for traditional cooking methods.

varieties.name: Pusa / DB Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled Pusa Basmati, nutrient-rich with improved cooking quality and grain separation.

varieties.name: 1401 Creamy Sella
varieties.details: Premium 1401 variety with creamy sella processing. Long grains with excellent aroma and taste.

varieties.name: Sharbati Raw
varieties.details: Extra-long grain Sharbati rice in raw form. Known for its exceptional length and premium quality.

varieties.name: Sharbati Steam
varieties.details: Steamed Sharbati rice with extra-long grains. Perfect for special occasions and premium dishes.

varieties.name: Sharbati Creamy Sella
varieties.details: Sharbati variety with creamy sella processing, offering excellent cooking quality and grain elongation.

varieties.name: Sharbati Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled Sharbati rice with rich color and enhanced nutritional value.

varieties.name: PR 14 Creamy Sella
varieties.details: PR 14 variety with creamy sella processing. Cost-effective option with good cooking properties.

varieties.name: PR 14 Steam
varieties.details: Steamed PR 14 Basmati rice, offering excellent value with good grain quality.

varieties.name: PR 14 Golden Sella
varieties.details: Golden parboiled PR 14 rice with improved shelf life and cooking characteristics.

varieties.name: 1509 Golden Sella
varieties.details: Premium 1509 variety with golden sella processing. Extra-long grains with excellent aroma.

varieties.name: 1509 Creamy Sella
varieties.details: 1509 Basmati with creamy sella processing. Superior quality with exceptional grain length and taste.

finishedProducts.storage: Cool, dry place away from moisture

wheat.name: Premium Wheat
wheat.description: Being a respected exporter of wheat in the global agro-food products market, we abide by all international standards. Clients obtain superior quality wheat sourced from the best fields.

chickpeas.name: Kabuli Chana (White Chickpeas)
chickpeas.description: Premium quality Kabuli Chickpeas (Garbanzo Beans) known for their light color, smooth texture, and nutty flavor. Rich in protein and fiber, our chickpeas are machine cleaned and sortexed to ensure consistent size and export-grade purity.

varieties.name: Kabuli Chana 8mm
varieties.details: Standard 8mm size Chickpeas (75-80 count/oz). Perfect for making hummus, bean flour, and traditional curries. Excellent flavor and uniform size.

varieties.name: Kabuli Chana 9mm
varieties.details: Medium large 9mm Chickpeas (58-60 count/oz). Ideal balance of size and texture. Popular for salads, canning, and side dishes.

varieties.name: Kabuli Chana 10mm Bold
varieties.details: Premium 10mm+ Super Bold Chickpeas (42-44 count/oz). The largest and most premium variety. Known for buttery texture and impressive presentation in roasted snacks and gourmet dishes.

packingTypes.description: Jumbo/Big bags for bulk industrial use

finishedProducts.storage: Cool, dry place. Fumigation recommended every 3 months.

pulses-lentils.name: Indian Pulses & Lentils
pulses-lentils.description: We offer a wide variety of premium Indian pulses and lentils, essential for a balanced diet. Our range includes Red Lentils, Green Mung, Toor Dal, Urad Dal, and Kidney Beans, all sourced from the best growing regions and processed to ensure purity and nutritional value.

varieties.name: Red Lentils (Masoor Dal)
varieties.details: Available as Football Masoor (Whole Red) and Split Masoor Dal. Quick-cooking, high in protein, and widely used in soups and curries. Max 12% moisture.

varieties.name: Green Mung Beans (Moong)
varieties.details: Premium Green Mung beans (Whole) and Split Yellow Moong Dal. Known for sprouting capability and easy digestibility. Uniform size and green color.

varieties.name: Toor Dal (Pigeon Peas)
varieties.details: Staple Indian pulse available in Oily and Non-Oily finishes. Rich nutty flavor, essential for Sambhar and Dal Fry. Max 1% foreign matter.

varieties.name: Urad Dal (Black Gram)
varieties.details: Available as Whole Black (Black Matpe), Whole White (Gota), and Split White. Essential for Idli/Dosa batter and Dal Makhani.

varieties.name: Kidney Beans (Rajma)
varieties.details: Premium Red Kidney Beans (Dark/Light) and Speckled (Chitra) varieties. Large kidney-shaped beans rich in iron and protein.
